text: Wilfred Moke Abro (born 12 February 1988) is a DR Congolese footballer who most recently played as a centre back for Turkish club Ankaragücü. ==International career== Moke made his debut for the DR Congo national football team in a friendly 2-0 win over Botswana on 5 June 2017. ==Career statistics== Statistics accurate as of match played ===Club=== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" |- !style="background: #DCDCDC; text-align: center" rowspan="2"|Club !style="background: #DCDCDC; text-align: center" rowspan="2"|Season !style="background: #DCDCDC; text-align: center" colspan="2"|League !style="background: #DCDCDC; text-align: center" colspan="2"|Cup !style="background: #DCDCDC; text-align: center" colspan="2"|League Cup !style="background: #DCDCDC; text-align: center" colspan="2"|Europe !style="background: #DCDCDC; text-align: center" colspan="2"|Other !style="background: #DCDCDC; text-align: center" colspan="3"|Total |- !
